vulnerabilities.Details: Server reflects arbitrary Origin header ('Access-Control-Allow-Origin: https://evil-scanner.com') **and** allows credentials. Severity: High. This is more severe because 'Access-Control-Allow-Credentials' is set to 'true'.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Do not reflect arbitrary Origin headers or use wildcards. Validate and explicitly whitelist trusted origins. Avoid using 'Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true' with wildcards or dynamic origins.
